item.title: Video Editor for Vlogs and Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a Video Editor who's awesome at editing vlogs and short videos. You'll need to be a pro at using CapCut and show us some cool videos you've edited. Your job will be to turn raw footage into engaging vlogs and shorts for our audience. Here are the main things you'd be doing:

- Editing vlogs and short videos using CapCut
- Working with the content team to understand what we need
- Making sure the videos look great on YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram
- Checking and fixing edits to make sure they're top-quality
- Listening to feedback and making changes when needed
- Keeping up with new trends and techniques to make our videos even better

If you've got some projects you've worked on before, especially vlogs and short videos, we'd love to see them!

Looking forward to working with you.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Documentary, Video Editing
Skills: CapCut, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Documentary, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphics video editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a motion graphics editor to collaborate on a YouTube channel. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating animated graphics, visual effects, and eye-catching titles that complement the video content. Proficiency in software like After Effects and Premiere Pro is highly valued. The job includes editing intros, transitions, and graphic elements for multiple videos per month. I am seeking someone creative, responsible, and able to meet deadlines. I offer competitive compensation and the opportunity to work on interesting and varied projects. Interested candidates, please send your portfolio and rates to my email.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:07 UTC

item.title: I Need an editor for my YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! I'm looking for a video editor who can make specific videos niche. The niche is about a famous basketball player talking about someone or something. You will need to clone the voice of the renowned player and use it throughout the video.
I am going to provide you with a script and video content, you will be needed to put them all together.
I aim to upload about 3 videos a week.  
The payment is going to be Fixed and per the video, so let me know in your request what will be the rate per video.
I'm adding an example of how the videos should look like, so if you think you can make something like that or something better let me know!
Looking forward to working with you!

https://www.youtube.com/@Ultrasreal/shorts

item.title: Reels editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for somebody what can expand our team and create consistently 4 reels per week.

The reels consist of either working with b-roll, stock footage, or material we already have.

It is a simple work, on which you will always receive a briefing. You'll also get involved into our strategy at the beginning so you know which direction to take the reels.

What we're looking for is your creative eye and creative support as well. We want you to add your personal note on the reels and support us as somebody who is an expert in this field.

Please send samples of your already done work in your application.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production

item.title: Video Editing - 3 * Social Media Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Brief - Social Media Video Editing
About us
We are a band, about to embark on a tour in Germany.
We are called Ukulele Death Squad.
You can find our music and tour info at www.ukedeathsquad.com and ukedeathsquad.com/touring
Video Brief:
Intiailly, we are after 3 short videos with different content (between 30-60 Seconds) in the following formats for use to promote our upcoming tour with footage shot on our phones from our trip in 2023.
What is it fo
For Facebook and Instagram Reels
Format
1080*1920
Aspect: 9:16
Bitrate: 256kbps
Frame rate: 30fps
Style references
Examples of in terms of Social Vibes of band cuts we like.
·         https://www.instagram.com/p/C8PSQzct6Kj/
·         https://www.instagram.com/p/C7eXOUysHgo/
·         https://www.instagram.com/p/C8qq61XS0AI/
·         https://www.instagram.com/p/C8KgTOPvDXX/
Examples of what we’re like (Noting this is more longform, and we need something more social friendly)



·         https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WxfZkMm3wcg
·         https://vimeo.com/154551339
·         https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=48G55z5_IPQ
·         https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=48G55z5_IPQ
·         https://www.bucketlistly.blog/posts/best-travel-videos
·         https://vimeo.com/159937841

Style Notes
Ideally, something Punchy and fast but also has moments of calm for reflection.
Also, if possible, include flicking through photos really quickly (i.e. a fast photo shuffle effect).
Text to feature on video.
UKULELE DEATH SQUAD ARE BACK
GERMANY 2024 TOUR
BERLIN , FRANKFURT, GOTTINGEN, RUDOLSTADT, PEGNITZ, AUGSBURG
*or use tour dates****
JULY 04 – BERLIN | JULY 5-6 - RUDOLSTADT | JULY 9 – FRANKFURT | JULY 10 – GOTTINGEN | JULY 12 PEGNITZ | JULY 13 AUGSBURG
(it across the video, not just in one big block)
**** Feel free to add any other relevant text you think works with the video****
END WITH UKULELE DEATH SQUAD LOGO AND CREATIVE AUSTRALIA LOGO (CAN BE TOGETHER)

Assets:
Photos/Videos from out last tour to be used for video: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1sLG8rJuSFUK9_CNnbAoPPFzLmQBrX3TD
UDS BABY DON”T FUCK WITH ME Logo: https://drive.google.com/file/d/198C81JDN9ZaFZG975OVSeV9YZn5p16yM/view?usp=drivesdk  or
UDS Logo: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zyRQN9L6ggMA3cOVVHI51XR-FTfvh980
Creative Australia Logo: https://creative.gov.au/investment-and-development/successful-applications/logo-downloads/)
Songs to Use:
Hands Tied:
Baby Don’t
EP Available here in MP3 Form: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1k0lFXPPVfDLFfdgIT9QKHYMCa88EwrDm


Further Work
If we like this edit, we are looking for some to create content at the end of each day during our upcoming Germany Tour. (ideally one to two videos each day).
We would upload all our footage to a google drive at the end of each day, and then you would do some edits for social media (Square, Landscape and Portrait Edits) for us to post hte next day.
The Tour dates are  
July 04 – Berlin
July 5-6 - Rudolstadt
July 9 – Frankfurt
July 10 - Gottingen
July 12 Pegnitz
July 13 Augsburg
It would be ideal on for someone working on a different time schedule than Europe.






Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Vintage USA Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced video editor needed for a youtube channel about Vintage/Nostalgia USA. We want to create videos similar to:
https://www.youtube.com/@AmericaBefore

- The videos will be around 20-minutes long
- Looking to do 3-4 per week

Requirements:
- Good communication skills
- Fast response & turnaround time
- Being able to find source material & references

Please do not apply if you don't have experience editing videos for youtube channels.

Looking forward to working with you!
Jacek

item.title: YouTube Thumbnail Artist - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!
We are looking for an experienced YouTube Thumbnail Artist to join our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of our target audience and be able to create eye-catching and engaging thumbnails that will attract viewers.

    Responsibilities:
    - collaborate with our content creators to understand the video content and key points
    - use graphic design software to create thumbnails that reflect the video content and capture viewers' attention
    - optimize thumbnails for different platforms and devices
    - stay up-to-date with the latest trends in thumbnail design and YouTube best practices

    Skills:
    - Proficient in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop or Canva
    - Strong understanding of YouTube and its community
    - Creative thinking and ability to come up with unique thumbnail ideas
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines

     Type of work:
     - Zero to Hero Business Documentaries
     - Anything with interesting background relating to large glamorous companies

     Channel Models:
     - https://www.youtube.com/@BigCompanyYT/videos
     - https://www.youtube.com/@MagnatesMedia/videos
     - https://www.youtube.com/@BusinessStoriesOfficial/videos

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:48 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

    - collaborate with our content creators to understand the video content and key points
    - use graphic design software to create thumbnails that reflect the video content and capture viewers' attention
    - optimize thumbnails for different platforms and devices
    - stay up-to-date with the latest trends in thumbnail design and YouTube best practices

    Skills:
    - Proficient in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop or Canva
    - Strong understanding of YouTube and its community
    - Creative thinking and ability to come up with unique thumbnail ideas
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines

     Type of work:
     - Zero to Hero Business Documentaries
     - Anything with interesting background relating to large glamorous companies

     Channel Models:
     - https://www.youtube.com/@BigCompanyYT/videos
     - https://www.youtube.com/@MagnatesMedia/videos
     - https://www.youtube.com/@BusinessStoriesOfficial/videos

Budget: $50

item.title: Video editor / Visual storyteller - Upwork
item.description:
I am a mental performance coach to football (soccer) players.

I have an app that players listen to and are guided in their visualisations.

I want to get the message out about what my app does and how it benefits players. All in a way that looks aspirational.

I'm looking for someone to put this together and also come up with ideas about how to make this look great.

It is likely that I will get a lot of user generated video / images of players with headphones on, listening to guided visualisations..

My initial thoughts would be that we then look to transition this into making it look like their brain is becoming engaged, before we transition into their visualisation... so this will likely be well put together B-roll of highlights from their game or other matches.

Maybe the audio will be a mixture of sound effects, music as well as my voice providing parts of the guided visualisation.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Cash Cow Video Editor For YouTube Chanel (News/Politics) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor to help out with our new channel.

Our channel is about politics in the US. The video will have a clip of an event, then a clip about the event being talked about.

Here is a good example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hY4ha-FDZXY

This job will require a very fast turnaround time, so if you can't keep up please do not apply.

We will first start with Shorts (videos under 1 minute) and then expand out to longer 10-minute videos or so.

You will have to understand fair use and using original clips as these will be played in our videos briefly.

Budget: $5

item.title: Anti-Woke Documentary Style Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
### Role:

Seeking a creative and skilled Video Editor to craft visually compelling documentaries for our anti-woke channel. Familiarity with editing styles akin to SunnyV2 or Moon is highly desirable.

### Responsibilities:

- Edit footage to create a cohesive and engaging narrative.
- Implement dynamic editing styles inspired by SunnyV2 or Moon.
- Collaborate with narrators and scriptwriters to align visual content with the script.
- Deliver high-quality, polished videos within set deadlines.

### Requirements:

- Proven experience in video editing, with a portfolio demonstrating skills in dynamic and modern editing techniques.
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- A keen eye for visual storytelling and pacing.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work in a team environment.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Documentary, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Documentary, Video Production
Country: Brazil
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor For YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! We are a YouTube Automation company and we are looking for a talented,
hard-working, and experienced Video Editor to join our team.
We are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in editing videos for:

The Business Niche, a similar channel to these:
- https://www.youtube.com/@BigCompanyYT/videos
- https://www.youtube.com/@MagnatesMedia/videos
- https://www.youtube.com/@BusinessStoriesOfficial/videos

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and
eventually, if we are a good fit we would also have the full-time/retainer opportunity.
Please do not apply if you do not have any experience.
Looking forward to working with you!
Luke

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!
We are looking for Multiple experienced Video Editors to join our YouTube channel team. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our videos to create engaging content for our viewers. The ideal candidate should have a strong creative vision and be able to bring ideas to life through video editing. You should have a solid understanding of video editing software and techniques, as well as experience in color grading, audio mixing, and motion graphics. Attention to detail and the ability to work under tight deadlines are essential.

Luke
    

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
    - Strong understanding of color grading and audio mixing
    - Experience in motion graphics and visual effects
    - Ability to work with raw footage and enhance it to produce high-quality videos

     Type of work:
     - Zero to Hero Business Documentaries
     - Anything with interesting background relating to large glamorous companies

     Channel Models:
     - https://www.youtube.com/@BigCompanyYT/videos
     - https://www.youtube.com/@MagnatesMedia/videos
     - https://www.youtube.com/@BusinessStoriesOfficial/videos
  

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 12:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply
